text: It may be worth digging into using one of the friendly libraries - you might find that you can optimize the training when you have control over it in code, rather than using something visual which may have trouble optimizing (i.e. "jack of all trades, master of none" kind of thing). You can set up a simple NN in keras/pytorch within a few lines.
